name: Towers II: Plight of the Stargazer
overview: Towers II: Plight of the Stargazer was completely finished, playtested, ESRB-rated, and ready for manufacturing before it was cancelled. Publisher Vatical Entertainment was having financial difficulties by that time and was not able to secure distribution for the game. It was shelved soon after. Around the end of development, an updated version was also produced so it would probably run on the GBA in compatibility mode.
